Are you sure you want to set the \"{{tit: Are you sure you want to set the "{{title}}" field as a record unique key? This setting cannot be changed after it's been set.
Field synchronization confirmation promp: Are you sure you want to synchronize fields from database? Depends on the number of tables and fields, This operation may take anywhere from a few seconds to several dozen seconds. If you only need to sync specific tables, please use the "Configure Fields" - "Sync from database" for those tables.
Filter data based on the specific field,: Filter data based on the specific field, with the requirement that the field value must be unique.
If a collection lacks a primary key, you: If a collection lacks a primary key, you must configure a unique record key to locate row records within a block, failure to configure this will prevent the creation of data blocks for the collection.
No external data source plugin installed: No external data source plugin installed
The following field types are not compat: The following field types are not compatible and do not support output and display
ai.tools.getDataSources.title: Get data sources
ai.tools.getDataSources.about: Retrieve list of all available data sources
ai.tools.getCollectionNames.title: Get collection names
ai.tools.getCollectionNames.about: Retrieve names and titles map of all collections
ai.tools.getCollectionMetadata.title: Get collection metadata
ai.tools.getCollectionMetadata.about: Retrieve metadata for specified collections and their fields
ai.tools.defineCollections.title: Define collections
ai.tools.intentRouter.title: Intent Router
ai.tools.searchFieldMetadata.title: Search field metadata
ai.tools.searchFieldMetadata.about: Search fields in data models by keyword (english first). Returns either search results or a suggested query.
ai.tools.dataSourceQuery.title: Data source query
ai.tools.dataSourceQuery.about: Use dataSource, collectionName, and collection fields to query data from the database
ai.tools.dataSourceCounting.title: Data source records counting
ai.tools.dataSourceCounting.about: Use dataSource, collectionName, and collection fields to query data from the database, get total count of records
ai.tools.dataQuery.args.sort: Sort field names. By default, they are in ascending order. A minus sign before the field name indicates descending order
ai.tools.dataQuery.args.offset: Offset of records to be queried
ai.tools.dataQuery.args.limit: Maximum number of records to be queried
